title: Hola, 你好, こんにちは Quarkus
content: Since the launch of Japanese ja.quarkus.io, we got contributors translating the website into (simplified) Chinese at cn.quarkus.io and recently we added Spanish at es.quarkus.io too. These sites are now accessible via the drop-down "globe" menu in the top-right corner. I find it amazing and want to thank the ~30 contributors...
